route.name: schemaList
route.comment: A list of schemata for data returned by API resources

route.name: schemaEntry
route.comment: Request a schema definition for the resource specified by parameter :xsdname

route.name: profile
route.comment: The profile of the logged-in user

route.name: broker
route.comment: A broker resource which can execute multiple requests on other resources with one call

route.name: appsList
route.comment: A list of software entry resources

route.name: applogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: ppllogistics
route.comment: A list of people logistics per various properties

route.name: appsDetails
route.comment: The software entry specified by the parameter :id

route.name: appItemPerms
route.comment: A list of actors with privileges on the entry

route.name: apppubs
route.comment: A list of scientific publications that the software entry specified by the parameter :id has led to

route.name: apppub
route.comment: The scientific publication entry specified by the parameter :pid

route.name: apptags
route.comment: A list of tags that have been applied users and the system to the software entry specified by the parameter :id

route.name: apptag
route.comment: The tag entry specified by the parameter :tid

route.name: relatedApps
route.comment: A list of software entries that related to the software entry specified by the paramter :id

route.name: relatedAppsLogistics
route.comment: A list of related application logistics per various properties

route.name: rateReport
route.comment: A report about ratings the software entry specified by the parameter :id has received by all users

route.name: rateReport2
route.comment: A report about ratings the software entry specified by the parameter :id has received by registered (:type="internal") or anonymous (:type="external") users

route.name: ratings
route.comment: A list of all the ratings the software entry specified by the parameter :id has received by all users

route.name: rating
route.comment: The rating entry specified by the parameter :rid

route.name: apphistory
route.comment: A list of all previous states that the software entry specified by the parameter :id has been in, with regard to changes by authorized users

route.name: apphistoryitem
route.comment: The historical state of a software entry specified by parameter :hid

route.name: apphistoryrbitem
route.comment: Rolls-back a software entry to the state it was in as described by the parameter :hid

route.name: personprivs
route.comment: A list of the person's privileges on other targets

route.name: pplvolist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is related to

route.name: vomemberlist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is a member of

route.name: vomanagerlist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is a manager of

route.name: vodeputylist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is a deputy of

route.name: voexpertlist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is an expert of

route.name: voshifterlist
route.comment: A list of VOs the user specified by parameter :id is a shifter of

route.name: appreport
route.comment: A list of applications the user specified by parameter :id follows

route.name: appfollowlist
route.comment: A list of applications the user specified by parameter :id follows

route.name: appfollowitem
route.comment: The software entry that the user follows, specified by the parameter :appid

route.name: appfollowLogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: bookmarks
route.comment: A list of all software entries that the user specified by parameter :id has bookmarked

route.name: bookmarks2
route.comment: The software entry that the user has bookmarked, as specified by parameter :bmid

route.name: bookmarkLogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: editableApps
route.comment: A list of all software entries that the user can edit

route.name: editableAppLogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: ownedApps
route.comment: A list of all the software entries that the user "owns"

route.name: ownedAppLogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: associatedApps
route.comment: A list of all the software entries in whose contact list the user is in

route.name: associatedAppLogistics
route.comment: A list of software logistics per various properties

route.name: peopleList
route.comment: A list of the registered users

route.name: peopleDetails
route.comment: The profile entry of the user specified by the parameter :id

route.name: countries
route.comment: A list of countries that registed users are affiliated with

route.name: categories
route.comment: A flat list of categories by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: hcategories
route.comment: A hierarchical list of categories by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: category
route.comment: The software category entry specified by parameter :id

route.name: langs
route.comment: A list of programming languages by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: oses
route.comment: A list of computer operating systems by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: licenses
route.comment: A list of software licenses by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: hvs
route.comment: A list of virtualization hypervisors by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: vmifmt
route.comment: A list of virtualization image formats by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: archs
route.comment: A list of computer architectures by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: va_providers
route.comment: A list of virtualization providers

route.name: va_provider
route.comment: The virtualization provider entry specified by parameter :id

route.name: sites
route.comment: A list of sites

route.name: sitelogistics
route.comment: A list of Site logistics per various properties

route.name: site
route.comment: The site entry specified by the parameter :id

route.name: sitefilterreflection
route.comment: Filter reflection resource for site searchers

route.name: disciplines
route.comment: A list of disciplines by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: discipline
route.comment: The software discipline entry specified by parameter :id

route.name: hdisciplines
route.comment: A hierarchical list of disciplines by which a user may classify software entries

route.name: mws
route.comment: A list of distributed computing middlewares that may be listed under a software entry

route.name: statuses
route.comment: A list of states with regard to usability that a software entry may be classified by

route.name: vos
route.comment: A list of grid Virtual Organizations which may provide access to software

route.name: vo
route.comment: The grid Virtual Organization entry specified by parameter :id

route.name: roles
route.comment: A list of available roles for users to choose from

route.name: tags
route.comment: A list of all the tags that have been used in one or more software entries

route.name: contacttypes
route.comment: A list of contact types that a user may specify in his or her profile

route.name: appfiltercheck
route.comment: Filter normalization resource for application searches

route.name: appfilterreflection
route.comment: Filter reflection resource for application searchers

route.name: pplfiltercheck
route.comment: Filter normalization resource for user searches

route.name: pplfilterreflection
route.comment: Filter reflection resource for user searches

route.name: vofiltercheck
route.comment: Filter normalization resource for VO searches

route.name: vofilterreflection
route.comment: Filter reflection resource for VO searches

route.name: resources
route.comment: A list of all resource provided by the AppDB REST web-API

route.comment: EGI Scientific Discipline Classification API

route.comment: Alias for EGI Scientific Discipline Classification API

route.comment: EGI Scientific Discipline Classification API

route.name: sciclassitemalias1
route.comment: Alias for EGI Scientific Discipline Classification API

route.name: vologistics
route.comment: A list of VO logistics per various properties

route.name: entityrelationtypes
route.comment: A list of possible entity relation types

route.name: swappliancereport
route.comment: A list of vappliances with their refered software appliances

route.name: datasets
route.comment: A list of available datasets

route.name: dsexchangeformats
route.comment: A list of available exchange formats for datasets

route.name: dsconnectiontypes
route.comment: A list of available connection types for datasets

route.name: datasetitem
route.comment: The dataset entry specified by the parameter :id

route.name: datasetverlist
route.comment: The dataset version list

route.name: datasetveritem
route.comment: The dataset version entry specified by the parameter :vid

route.comment: The dataset location list for the dataset version specified by the parameter :vid

route.comment: The dataset location entry specified by the parameter :lid
